heroes.name: npc_dota_hero_undying
heroes.bio_loc:
他残破的心，已不再记得自己的名，已不再记得自己的命。

他还依稀记得的，是盔甲，是战旗，是身边死去的兄弟。他还记得那场战役：一双给他带去痛苦和恐惧的苍白的手，将他从马上扯下。他还记得自己和兄弟们一起被扔进死亡之神那漆黑的深坑，还记得他被虚无吞噬时耳畔的挽歌。在深渊下的黑暗中，他们被时间遗弃，抛弃了思想，抛弃了理智，唯一尚存的，只有饥饿。他们以彼此残留的指甲和牙齿为食，唤醒了身体。这时挽歌传来，一开始很遥远，只是最轻微的感官体验，然后声音逐渐汇集，似乎铺天盖地永无止境，歌声似乎形成了一堵音墙，将他意识中所有想法都清除。随着自己被挽歌吞噬，他也向死亡之神张开了双臂，迎接自己的陨灭。然而死亡之神并没有选择毁掉他，而是让他投入战争，在一片惨然的虚无中，他被赋予了新的使命：让世界遍地哀鸿，让死者吞噬生命。他成为了不朽尸王，死亡之神的先驱，他的躯体永生不灭。在你的往生路上，会奏响他永恒的挽歌。
heroes.hype_loc: 蹒跚进入战场的不朽尸王将迫使敌人做出决定，到底是逃离他的愤怒，还是被愤怒撕裂。他可以吸取敌军的力量，召唤出一群拼命的亡灵。等到他最终变成魁梧的血肉傀儡，他的敌人早已被碾压殆尽。
heroes.npe_desc_loc: 召唤大量僵尸攻击敌人

abilities.name: undying_decay
abilities.desc_loc: Undying steals strength from all enemy heroes in an area, dealing base damage as he claims the enemy's strength for himself. Deals %creep_damage_multiplier%x damage to creeps.
abilities.lore_loc: The strength of the living is simply borrowed from the strength of the dead.
notes_loc: The strength stolen stacks, but can't cause a hero to have strength below 1.
The strength steal takes effect before the damage is dealt.

abilities.name: undying_soul_rip
abilities.desc_loc: Undying rips health away from all nearby units and uses it to heal an ally, or damage an enemy. Soul Rip can also be used to heal Tombstone.
abilities.lore_loc: Even allies feel despair in Undying's presence.
notes_loc: Can heal Tombstone, but can't heal or damage other buildings.
Does not rip from invisible units, invulnerable units, units in the fog of war, or spell immune enemies.
Does rip from spell immune allies, including zombies.
facets_loc: Casting Soul Rip on allies increases their Strength by a percentage of Undying's Strength.

abilities.name: undying_tombstone
abilities.desc_loc: Summons a tombstone at the target point.  Zombies will frequently spawn next to every enemy unit in the area around the Tombstone, and attack them.  Zombies have the Deathlust ability, which causes their attacks to slow the target, and if the target reaches below a certain amount of health, increases the attack and movement speed of the zombie.
abilities.lore_loc: Dirge calls on his fallen brothers to fight for the Dead God.
notes_loc: Tombstone is Spell Immune, but can be healed by Soul Rip.
Zombies and Tombstone are Spell Immune.
If their initial target dies or goes out of vision, the Zombie will die.
abilities.shard_loc: Tombstone can be cast on an allied hero to bunker inside of the tombstone. Heroes that enter the Tombstone cannot leave for %tombstone_bunker_cd% seconds nor can they re-enter after leaving. If the tombstone is destroyed with a hero inside, that hero gets stunned for %tombstone_stun_penalty% seconds.

abilities.name: undying_ceaseless_dirge
abilities.desc_loc: When Undying dies he will instantly respawn in the fountain. Begins the game on cooldown. Cannot be refreshed.

abilities.name: undying_flesh_golem
abilities.desc_loc: Undying transforms into a horrifying flesh golem. Gains a percentage increase to strength and imbues attacks with a slow and damage amplification.
abilities.lore_loc: The flesh of the recently dead add to the power of Dirge's plague.
facets_loc: While transformed into a Flesh Golem, attacks spawn a zombie.

facets.description_loc: While transformed into a Flesh Golem, attacks spawn a zombie.
facets.name: undying_rotting_mitts

facets.description_loc: Casting Soul Rip on allies increases their Strength by a percentage of Undying's Strength.
facets.name: undying_ripped

new_abilities.name: undying_ceaseless_dirge
new_abilities.desc_loc: When Undying dies he will instantly respawn in the fountain. Begins the game on cooldown. Cannot be refreshed.
